pageTitle: Itinerary for Sunday, January 31, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Sunday, January 31, 2016:

Ottawa

Private appointments.


Media appearance

8:00 p.m. ET on CBC News Network

The Prime Minister will participate in CBC’s “Face to Face with the Prime Minister”, hosted by Peter Mansbridge.

PMO Media Relations: 613-957-5555
